title: APG 1.1 Checkbox Example (Two State)
description: This example implements the Checkbox Design Pattern for a two state checkbox using div elements.

jaws.chrome: Pressing the TAB or SHIFT+TAB keys to focus the first (or last) checkbox in the group caused the group label to be announced, but not the group role.

history.message: Remove expectations and results around list semantics. It's unclear why they are used and how they should behave as used in this context.
